name: com.unity.xr.openxr
description: OpenXR is an open, royalty-free standard developed by Khronos that aims to simplify AR/VR development by allowing developers to target a wide range of AR/VR devices. Use this plug-in to enable OpenXR in XR Plug-in Management. This experimental version added Composition Layer support (Pair with com.unity.xr.compositionlayers package)

samples.description: Basic sample showing how to create and reference OpenXR action maps with the new input system.
Shows a teapot mesh generated from native mesh subsystem with physics baked in background.
Demonstrates how to intercept an OpenXR method.
Demonstrates how to add support for a custom composition layer type.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
* Added XR Composition Layers support - Experimental. Install Composition Layer Experimental package - com.unity.xr.compositionlayers 0.5.0 to pair with.
